vsParam:
Er? So many people are crowding in the hall.
What happened?

Huh? I guess Silver Birch Sensei must be
displaying something novel again?

What did he invent this time?
Sorel, [px]! Let's check it out!

Ah, Anise!? She's really curious.
Hopefully, she won't suffer any explosion this time...

Hey, where did you come from?
Ah! What's your favorite food?

Hey, too many questions!
It's our turn to ask!

Er, but... There has never been such a cool handsome man in the
Academy. It's only natural everyone gets curious about him. Right?

You do have the nerve to say that! You flirted with
Ru Sensei before! You changed your mind so fast?

You... Um...
Oh, what do I do...

Huh? Who is he?
A guest here?

Oh, no wonder so many people are crowding here.
They are asking him various questions...

Oh? I was wondering where this young man
in odd clothes comes from. So he's from another world!

Ah, Silver Birch Sensei.
So, this scene was not caused by you and Popy.
Another world? Sorry, but what do you mean by that?

I'm afraid you ran into a "space-time distortion"
so that you came to this world.

And the device on your hand could prove it!
It involves some technology that's even beyond my ken!

Oh, sorry.
I'm Silver Birch, a mechanics lecturer in the Academy!

Oh, you're a lecturer.
My name is Logix Ficsario. Please just call me Logy.

Yeah, Logy. You must be somebody in your world
judging from the device you possess!

No, I'm nobody but an average civil servant.
I work in the Development Department in Colseit,
in charge of investigating relics and undeveloped areas.

I think I ran into a "space-time distortion"
during my investigation.

But another world... What do I do?
Escha is missing too...

I-it's going to be fine!
If you could come here, there must be a way to go back!

Yeah. Why not just stay in this Academy
before you figure out how to go back?

Yeah! I'm interested in your device.
Let's talk about it!

Talk about it... This is just a commonplace alchemical item,
used during investigation or when being attacked by monsters.

A-alchemical!? You're an alchemist, Logy?
Alchemy even involves the use of mechanics in your world?

Ah, no, not all the time...
But I do use special devices when practicing alchemy.

Oh, it's so much fun!
I'd like to practice such alchemy too...

Oh, it's getting late.
I have something to deal with off campus!

Oh, Logy. You may find my room at the end of the corridor!
Please drop by whenever you'd like to!

See you later!
Sorel and these people will fill you in! Haha!

Uh, wait!? (Sigh)... I can't believe it. Silver Birch just left.
He's Hazel Senpai's uncle. I guess like uncle, like niece...
Logy. Just let us know if you need anything.

Yeah, thank you. Let me see... Before everything,
I need to figure out the situation here...

Excuse me, but could you show me around here?
Maybe I'll find clues on how to get me back to my world.

Plus, I'm looking for someone.
A girl, about your age, named Escha...

Got it.
Let's walk around outside the Academy first!

OK, thank you.
All right, hopefully, I can find her soon...

Hmm~ Yummy!
Hee hee, thank god there is an apple tree here.

Huh? Ah, there's a girl over there...
She doesn't look like a student in the Academy.

Huh? Ah... Logy!
Boohoo, where have you been?

Escha!? You came to this world too!
I'm so glad to see you here...

This world? What do you mean...
Weren't we investigating the ruin?

But before I realized it, I found myself in a totally
strange place, without you or everyone else!
I was so, so worried about you, Logy!
Oh, um... Anyway, we'll talk after you finish that apple!

Oh! S-sorry...
This apple is way too sweet, so I couldn't resist it...
Hee hee, I get it. The Albus region is known for its super-quality apples!

I see, no wonder it tastes so good! I wonder
which is tastier, the ones here or those from Colseit...

Oh, apples in Colseit are delicious too?!
I wish I could enjoy them sometime!

Yes, they are not to be missed if you ever visit Colseit!
Hee hee, I promise you'll get addicted to that taste!

Haha! It seems you do love apples.
Logy, she's Escha?

Yeah. Escha is a civil servant just like me.
She's an alchemist as well.

Escha, you're an alchemist too.
You can use special devices just like Logy?

No, my alchemy is different from Logy's.
I put various ingredients into a cauldron and stir them!
Oh, I see! That's what [px] does too!

Huh, really?
We're the same kind of alchemists! Hee hee...

Hey, I think we should go back to the Academy now?
Anyway, we've found Escha.

Yeah, sure. Please introduce yourselves to us in detail
if you don't mind!

Yeah, sure!
Ah... May I have a few more apples?

Haha! Just enjoy yourself. You can even take some back.
And we can enjoy them together!

Great! I'm going to pick so many apples
and use them to make desserts!

Really!? Hee hee, desserts, desserts!
I'd really like to have apple pies.

Apple pies, sound delicious!
But my favorite is the apple tart!

Wow, then I'll try apple tarts too!
I can't wait, [px]!

Haha... I can't believe you've already got used to
this different world the day you arrived here...

Hehe.
You two will make our life in the Academy even more lively.

Hee hee...
Guys, nice to meet you all!
